page.title: 04TACKLEY GALA DAY
page.content: On 10th August 1985, Tackley will have their Gala Day. There will be a competition for the best poster advertising the event. There will be a six-a-side football competition for the under 13s, children's races and a craft display. There will be a tombola involving cans of food and vegetables. {Bletchingdon Silver Band}will be coming along. There will be bicycle polo using hockey sticks and tennis balls. The aerobics demonstration will be done by the 'Keep-fit' group. Side shows will include coconut stalls, Aunt Sally and a treasure hunt. The afternoon begins with a fancy dress parade on the theme of Outer Space. In the marquee there will be a flower and vegetable show, with sections for children. There are cups to be won.
